text: Turki bin Faisal Al Saud ( Turkī ibn Fayṣal Āl Su‘ūd; ) (born 15 February 1945), known also as Turki Al Faisal, is a Saudi prince and former politician. He is the chairman of King Faisal Foundations Center for Research and Islamic Studies. From 1979 to 2001, Prince Turki was the director general of Al Mukhabarat Al 'Ammah, Saudi Arabia's intelligence agency. He was ambassador to the United Kingdom and the United States. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi princes and princesses Category:Ambassadors to the United Kingdom Category:Ambassadors to the United States
title: Turki bin Faisal Al Saud
